body: Cambios en Cuba [ES] and Jamaica Salt both note with sadness the BBC's decision to cut parts of its Caribbean service in a bid to save money: "The expertise and the daily news that will be lost will have consequences far beyond the loss of  jobs and programmes."
original_body: Cambios en Cuba [ES] and Jamaica Salt both note with sadness the BBC's decision to cut parts of its Caribbean service in a bid to save money: "The expertise and the daily news that will be lost will have consequences far beyond the loss of jobs and programmes."
title: Jamaica, Cuba: Bye Bye, BBC

sentence: Cambios en Cuba [ES] and Jamaica Salt both note with sadness the BBC's decision to cut parts of its Caribbean service in a bid to save money: "The expertise and the daily news that will be lost will have consequences far beyond the loss of  jobs and programmes."
